entry.title: Today in DeFi - Raft V2 Live, Liquis Live, LPing for Airdrop, and More...
entry.summary: Raft V2 Live LST-backed stablecoin project Raft launches V2, introducing the 6% R Saving Rate and PSM. Liquis Live Liquis, a liquid governance wrapper for Bunni Pro (liquidity management for Uni V3), is live. Liquis allows users to stake range tokens to earn boosted emissions on Bunni.

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - Maker Proposes Solana-based NewChain, Greyscale Won Lawsuit Against SEC, IndexCoop New Indices and More...
entry.summary: Recap: Week of Aug 28th

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Bitcoin ETFs Delayed, Perp Dex on Kava, Limit and Stop loss orders on chain , and More...
entry.summary: Bitcoin ETFs Delayed The SEC delays decisions on spot Bitcoin ETF applications from BlackRock, Bitwise, VanEck, etc. The next deadlines come around mid-October. Kinetix Live on Kava Core Quickswap members launch Kinetix, a 50x leverage perp dex on Kava Chain, initially support $ATOM, $KAVA, $USDT, $axlwBTC, and $axlWETH.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - StarkWare Unlocks User Funds, Farcaster Live on OP Mainnet, Delta-Hedging Strategy, and More...
entry.summary: StarkWare Unlocks User Funds StarkWare re-enables 550K user funds after an upgrade siloed some funds. The team said the blockage was due to the 0.12.1 version upgrade last week, and users who had not upgraded could not access their accounts. Farcaster Live on OP Mainnet

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Grayscale Wins Lawsuit Against SEC, Avocado MultiSig, Delta-Hedged Leverage Farming, and More...
entry.summary: Grayscale Wins Lawsuit Against SEC The federal court ruled that the SEC must review its rejection of Grayscale's bid to convert GBTC into an ETF. The 3 judges ruled the SEC failed to explain its disparate treatment of one BTC ETF such that its denial was “arbitrary and capricious”.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Aerodrome Live on Base, Stargate on Kava, zkEVM with Potential Airdrop, and more...
entry.summary: Aerodrome Live on Base Aerodrome, a Velodrome fork DEX, is now live on Base. At launch, 40% of the initial Aero token supply will be distributed to veVELO holders as veAERO. Stargate Live on Kava Bridging protocol Stargate has deployed on Kava chain, enabling native USDT access.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Base x OP: Shared Governance, Base Magnate Rugpull, Stable Yield on Base, and more...
entry.summary: Base x Optimism: Shared Governance and Revenue-Sharing

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Solana Pay x Shopify, EUROe on Solana, LP as Collateral, and more...
entry.summary: Solana Pay x Shopify Solana Pay has integrated its plug-in with Shopify, allowing businesses on its platform to use it for payments. Solana plans to add other altcoins to the platform in the coming months, including SOL and meme token Bonk. EUROe on Solana

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Balancer Pool Vulnerability, Aave V3 on Base, Confirmation-Free Perps Trading, and more...
entry.summary: Balancer Pool Vulnerability Balancer has received a report of a critical vulnerability that affects some of its V2 pools. Emergency procedures have been executed and “over 97% of liquidity initially deemed vulnerable is now safe”. ”The vulnerability has not been exploited, however, 0.89% of total TVL ($5.6 million) remains at risk,”. Users are advised to withdraw from Balancer pools.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Aevo Friend Index Perp, Sushi V2 on Base, Incentivized Lending, and more...
entry.summary: Aevo Friend Index Perp Aevo lists FRIEND-PERP, an index perp of Friend Tech. The spot reference is the amount of ETH in the Friend Tech smart contract on Base, converted to dollars at the ETH/USD spot rate, and divided by 1,000,000. Sushi V2 on Base

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - Thorchain Lending Live, Sei Mainnet, Exactly Exploit, and More...
entry.summary: Recap: Week of Aug 14th

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Connext Token Launching, Scroll Sepolia Live, Concentrated LPing on Arbitrum, and more...
entry.summary: Connext Token Launching Bridging protocol Connext will launch its native token NEXT on Sept. 5. On the same day early users will be able to claim their airdrop across Polygon, Arbitrum, Optimism, and Gnosis Chain. Scroll Beta Testnet Live EVM-equivalent ZK-rollup

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Funds Stuck on Shibarium, ThorFi Lending Delayed, Testnet with Potential Airdrop, and more...
entry.summary: Funds Stuck on Shibarium The Shibarium L2 mainnet went live today. There seem to be some on-chain issues and transactions are stuck on Shibarium, with $1.8M currently locked on ETH. ThorFi Lending Delayed Thorchain devs recommend delaying the launch of ThorFi lending due to a security patch in the works. Thorchain is using a Binance Tss library with a vulnerability to be patched.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Sei Mainnet Live, Singapore Stablecoin Rules, Farming on crvUSD, and more...
entry.summary: Sei Mainnet Live Sei launches the Pacific-1 mainnet, with bridging and staking enabled. Early airdrop will be claimable later after an ecosystem warmup period. Singapore Stablecoin Rules The Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS) has finalized the stablecoin

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Arbitrum Odyssey 2.0, Immutable zkEVM Testnet, Diva Operator Testnet, and more...
entry.summary: Arbitrum Odyssey 2.0 The Odyssey 2.0 has launched with open-ended quests and time-limited quests. All scheduled quest lines are over the span of roughly three months. Immutable zkEVM Testnet Live Immutable zkEVM testnet is live. It is an EVM-compatible zk-rollup L2 dedicated to gaming products.

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - Base Launches Onchain Summer, Projects Wind Down, SEC Delays Bitcoin ETF, and More...
entry.summary: Recap: Week of Aug 7th

entry.title: Today in DeFi - PancakeSwap on Arbitrum, Sentiment Sunsetting V1, Stable Pools with Boost, and more...
entry.summary: PancakeSwap on Arbitrum BnB Chain-based DEX PancakeSwap is now live on Arbitrum with Swaps, Liquidity Provision, and upcoming Farms and IFOs. Sentiment Sunsetting V1 Sentiment V1 will sunset on Aug 22nd, while the team is working on the upcoming V2. Previously, Sentiment was affected by the Cruve exploit and had deprecated support for Convex/Curve TriCrypto pools.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Base Mainnet Live, SpiritSwap Winding Down, Angle Launches V2, and more...
entry.summary: Base Mainnet Live Base mainnet is now open to the public, with 100+ dApps available. The Base team launches the Onchain Summer campaign, encouraging engagement with daily NFT mints. SpiritSwap Winding Down Fantom-based DEX SpiritSwap is looking for a team to hand things to. If no team is going to take over, the project will stop operations on 9/1.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Saddle to Close Down, Goldfinch Faces Loan Default, Upgraded Perps Trading, and more...
entry.summary: Saddle to Close Down Curve fork protocol Saddle plans to wind down the protocol and airdrop protocol-owned $ARB tokens to $SDL/veSDL holders. Goldfinch Faces Loan Default RWA protocol Goldfinch has defaulted on a $5m loan to Kenyan motorcycle company Tugende. Tugende reportedly breached the terms of the loan agreement, resulting in a default amounting to approximately 4% of Goldfinch's TVL.
